X-TextureTiling.description: How much to tile the texture coordinates in the U (X) direction. 1.0 means the texture will be stretched across the entire grid, 2.0 means the texture will be tiled twice, etc.

Z-TextureTiling.description: How much to tile the texture coordinates in the V (Z) direction. 1.0 means the texture will be stretched across the entire grid, 2.0 means the texture will be tiled twice, etc.
